name: Without Within (itch)
description:
Without Within is my first Bitsy game! Made for the Little Details Bitsy Jam for July 6th, 2021. Heavily inspired by my experiences living alone in a studio apartment during 2020. It's funny how the little details of pandemic life became cultural touchstones, and I wanted to make a personal game about that feeling. Enjoy! And let me know what you think.

Controls:

  • On a computer, use WASD or the arrow keys to move and interact.
  • On a mobile device, swipe in a direction to move and interact.
